bibl.title: Twilight of the Gods. Economic Power and the Land Tenure Regime in Ptolemaic Egypt.
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II
bibl.author: MANNING, Joseph G.

bibl.note: The royal economy. - Temples and private property. - The Greek domination model. - A revenue economy model. - Economic power. - The IEMP [ideological, economic, military, political] model. - Bibliography.
MANNING Joseph G., Twilight of the Gods. Economic Power and the Land Tenure Regime in Ptolemaic Egypt.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 861-878, 1 fig.
